Recently we have shown that the centrality dependence of the multiplicity of different hadron
species observed in RHIC and SPS experiments can be well understood in a simple model, dubbed
There it is assumed that those incoming nucleons which scatter only once
produce hadrons as in pp collisions whereas those which scatter more often form an equilibrated
source which decays according to phase space. In this article we show that also kinematical variables
between peripheral heavy ion collisions and
